availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Hartford, Ohio County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Jane Stevens. Father of William Stevens, Joseph L. Stevens, Sally A. Stevens, Florence Stevens. Farmer in Hartford, Ohio County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ohio County, Hartford p. 68.
Find A Grave, "John B. Stevens (December 1, 1806 -September 17, 1877)," Memorial #8933833, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/8933833 (accessed January 4, 2019).
